Title: Deliver Us from Evil
Genre: Action, Adventure, Biography, Crime, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Writer: Scott Derrickson (screenplay), Paul Harris Boardman (screenplay), Ralph Sarchie (book), Lisa Collier Cool (book)
Actors: Eric Bana, Edgar Ram√≠rez, Olivia Munn, Chris Coy
Plot: New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest, schooled in the rites of exorcism, to combat the possessions that are terrorizing their city.
